numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that African-American players dominate basketball.
2. I notice that African-American players dominate football.
3. I notice that soccer is close to the 50% mark for African-American players.
4. I notice that baseball is close to the 50% mark for African-American players.
5. None of the five sports has more than 50% minority head coaches or minority managers.
6. I wonder if a time will come when one of these sports exceeds 50% minority head coaches or minority managers.
7. I eat and breathe and sleep sports.
8. I am passionate about racial issues.
10. I think that minorities are treated badly in this country.
11. I think that these graphs show an example of racial inequality.
12. The headline is: Sports need a color-blindness test.
